title: Generate complete social media campaigns with DALL¬∑E, GPT-4o and Slack approval
description:
## üìò Description
This workflow turns raw product inputs into a complete, launch-ready AI-generated social media campaign package. It accepts product details via webhook, sanitizes messy fields, generates a strategic campaign blueprint, produces Instagram captions, creates discovery-optimized hashtags, generates photorealistic commercial images, computes optimal posting times, assembles all outputs into a unified JSON package, and finally delivers the entire campaign to Slack.
Multiple AI agents work in sequence to generate structured outputs ‚Äî each parsed and validated using strict JSON schemas. Images produced by DALL¬∑E 3 are uploaded to Cloudinary for hosting. A post-processing module then merges captions, images, hashtags, and schedules into a final payload. A robust error handler ensures every failure is captured and sent to Slack with diagnostic information.
This workflow replaces an entire marketing team‚Äôs creative production pipeline, producing consistent, multi-asset campaign kits in minutes.

## ‚öôÔ∏è What This Workflow Does (Step-by-Step)

üü¢ Receive Product Details via Webhook
 Captures incoming product data including name, description, benefits, audience, and brand voice.

üßπ Clean & Normalize Product Input Fields
 Sanitizes escaped characters, trims whitespace, and prepares stable fields for AI consumption.

üß† Generate Campaign Blueprint Using AI
 Creates a full strategic blueprint in structured JSON:
 ‚Ä¢ Article summary
 ‚Ä¢ Insights
 ‚Ä¢ Tone and target audience mapping
 ‚Ä¢ Platform-specific post objects

üß† LLM Engine + Structured Parser for Blueprint
 Ensures blueprint output is clean, validated JSON aligned with schema.

‚úçÔ∏è Generate Instagram Captions Using AI
 Produces five short, conversion-ready captions + CTAs, based on blueprint insights.

üß† Caption LLM + Structured Parser
 Validates caption schema for downstream use.

#Ô∏è‚É£ Generate Hashtag Set Using AI
 Creates 12‚Äì18 optimized hashtags using discovery strategy (broad, mid, niche).

üß† Hashtag LLM + Parser
 Validates and ensures hashtags follow correct JSON structure.

üé® Split Campaign Posts for Image Generation
 Breaks out each post‚Äôs image prompt for independent asset creation.

üñºÔ∏è Generate Social Media Image Using AI
 Uses DALL¬∑E 3 to create ultra-realistic, 8K-style commercial visuals tailored to the campaign.

‚òÅÔ∏è Upload Generated Image to Cloudinary
 Uploads rendered images and retrieves secure public URLs.

üïí Generate Optimal Posting Schedule Using AI
 Recommends best posting time per platform (Asia/Kolkata timezone) + reasoning.

üß† Schedule LLM + Parser
 Ensures a structured schedule schema with platform, time, and rationale.

üîÄ Combine All Campaign Assets
 Merges:
 ‚Ä¢ Cloudinary image URLs
 ‚Ä¢ Captions + CTAs
 ‚Ä¢ Hashtag set
 ‚Ä¢ Posting schedule
 into one final dataset.

üß© Prepare Final Campaign Package JSON
 Constructs production-ready unified JSON: images, captions, hashtags, schedule.

üí¨ Send Final Campaign Package to Slack
 Delivers formatted campaign output with:
 ‚Ä¢ Image URLs
 ‚Ä¢ Captions + CTAs
 ‚Ä¢ Hashtags
 ‚Ä¢ Posting times
 for immediate creative review.

üö® Error Handler Trigger ‚Üí Slack Alert
 Captures workflow failures and sends structured debugging info to Slack.


## üß© Prerequisites
 ‚Ä¢ OpenAI API (GPT-4o + DALL¬∑E 3)
 ‚Ä¢ Cloudinary account (image hosting)
 ‚Ä¢ Slack bot token
 ‚Ä¢ Valid webhook endpoint
 ‚Ä¢ Clean product input JSON

## üí° Key Benefits
 ‚úî Full AI-generated multi-asset campaign in minutes
 ‚úî Eliminates manual copywriting, design, and planning
 ‚úî Ensures structured, reliable JSON at every stage
 ‚úî Creates polished commercial visuals instantly
 ‚úî Produces posting strategy tailored to audience behavior
 ‚úî Unified campaign delivery straight to Slack

## üë• Perfect For
-  Consumer brands launching fast cycles
-  Agencies needing rapid campaign generation
-  Teams without in-house designers/copywriters
-  Influencers or D2C founders wanting automated content production
